name: Love Gearwheels (Demo)
description:
The Vehicles Circle is a college circle where a few girls bond together over their love for different vehicles. Asunder, a fresh high-school graduate, enters college, meeting as a quirk of fate the different girls that are Umi, Kizuna, Yozora and Hanabira.

An attempt at a romantic yuri visual novel. As of now, only a part of the common route is online. This is a demo, meaning this has the value of a proof of concept, to illustrate what the script could become given the resources at disposal. Made with the Yuri Game Jam 2021 event in mind.
